channel.title: Something wrong with my ranging
channel.description: Well, when I attack someone with a bow, it runs towards them, ranges them on the way and it hits instantly. How can I make it so that: a) It ranges them once, and then runs towards them (possibly ranging them on the way) b) It damages them when the projectile hits them.

item.title: Something wrong with my ranging
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Well, when I attack someone with a bow, it runs towards them, ranges them on the way and it hits instantly.
How can I make it so that:
a) It ranges them once, and then runs towards them (possibly ranging them on the way)
b) It damages them when the projectile hits them.

Read full topic
